Package com.code.aon.common

Interface Summary
IAttachment Interface of Attach Objects.
ICollectionProvider Interface that provides a collection of objects.
ICriteriaProvider This class provides a Criteria object.
IFinderBean Interface that allows search operations over the entities of the model.
IHeaderObject Base interface that constructs a Header Object.
ILookupObject Deprecated.
IManagerBean Interface that allows operations such as create, read, update and delete, over the entities of the model.
IResourceLoader Base interface that loads any Aon-Framework resource.
ITransferObject Base class of any component in the Aon-Framework plataform.
 

Class Summary
AbstractFieldMapper Abstract Base Class for all DAO classes with a mapping between column alias and database column names.
BasicFinderBean Basic implementation of the IFinderBean class.
BasicManagerBean Basic implementation of the IManagerBean class.
BeanFactoryManager Deprecated.  
BeanManager This class manages all the beans registered in the application.
ObjectWrapper TODO
 

Exception Summary
AonException The class AonException and its subclasses are a form of Throwable that indicates conditions that a reasonable AON application might want to catch.
ManagerBeanException The class ManagerBeanException indicates conditions created by a IManagerBean that a reasonable AON application might want to catch.
